name: HANDYCAMP feat. B-Bun
description:
A handful of dancing. Routines anyone can handle. With the hand references getting out of hand, it's pretty obvious that this dance game doesn't involve any legs. 

Featuring B-Bun, a renowned dancer and choreographer who will teach you a couple of handy moves to show off on the floor. 

Programming: Tomáš "brendor" Kováč (contact)
2D Art and animation: Sournoodl
Background music: Philipp Kapusta

Level Song credits:
Koinu - Tomodachi 
BatchBug - Easymode
